data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Describe ways that societies can reduce the amount of waste that is created."
data.answer: There are different ways for societies to reduce the amount of waste that is created by residents and companies. For example, buying less, avoiding food wrapped in plastic and single-use items, bringing our own shopping bags, and using our own reusable bottles are some practical ways for residents to implement to help reduce waste at home. What’s more, companies can go paperless or create a recycling center to help decrease waste at work. Furthermore, governments can introduce practical ways to residents and corporations to help reduce waste.
